review: Some years ago vasundhara enclave had very limited choice for Dentist. Now there are so many dental clinics in Vasundhara Enclave. On google I found so many names but Dr Jyoti & Dr Abhimanyu are only specialist with very advanced dental centre. It’s very hygienic and staff is also polite.Very experienced doctors and very positive. After talking to them for 15 mins during consultation it was clear the doctor have very detailed and advanced knowledge.My old dentist was forcing me to get a tooth removed and replaced by implant, I visited Dr Jyoti for a second opinion and after listening to my issue and x ray she told me it Tooth can very easily be saved. I decided to go ahead with RCT. It was painless and quick. Dr Ahlawat is very genuine, I saved my tooth I saved my money.Happy with my RCT & Crown. Nice doctors. Hygienic clinic. Very new advanced painless electric injection.

I have been suffering from recurring headaches and jaw pain over last 2-3 years. I have been to various dentists and physicians to find a solution, however the issue persisted. Finally I came across Dr Abhimanyu on google as a TMJ specialist at The Tooth Dental & Orofacial clinic so I visited him. He listened to me carefully and did a thorough analysis. After which he devised a custom treatment along with simple physiotherapy exercises for me. I experienced significant improvement in my symptoms and could finally be pain free. Great doctor

I feel very lucky, privileged and happy to visit this clinic. Dr Abhimanyu sir cleared all my apprehensions and helped in my quest of perfectly aligned teeth. Before starting the procedure. Sir, gave me tremendous insights regarding the procedure and it's cost. Affordable cost and ease of process really made this experience a memorable journey for me. Anyone out there with any sort of dental problem , please visit this clinic as soon as possible. You will get what you want( a beautiful smile and inner satisfaction).

review: Dr abhimanyu is extremely polite *** ******** We went to two other dentist previously who did a botched up job for my sister's implant treatment. Finally we met Dr abhimanyu. He managed to successfully complete her implant treatment with utmost care and success. We're glad to have found him.
Dr Abhimanyu and all of his staff are unfailing competent and friendly; they have taken me quickly on several emergencies and are always kind and professional...I highly recommend them
Dr Abhimanyu is fantastic, so reassuring and skilled. The consult was straightforward and explained the issues in detail. Highly recommended.

review: I had a root canal treatment done at The Tooth Dental & Orofacial Clinic, and it was a great experience. The doctors were professional, and the treatment was painless. I would recommend this clinic to anyone looking for RCT in Delhi.
Got my orthodontist treatment here. I got my Invisalign Aligner. The charges here very less for same treatment elsewhere and nearby. I am satisfied.

I can surely recommend this dental clinic without any doubt . I visited with tooth pain which has relieved instantly . The reception staff were good makes you feel at home ...

highly recommended

I visited this clinic last week with a severely painful tooth. Doctor performed Laser RCT in just one sitting ..that too under 30 minutes. Excellent standards of cleanliness and professionalism. They keep up with international standards for sure

Dr Sharma did my dental implant treatment, I was mesmerised by his knowledge, skill and understanding of Implants. In 20 mins he removed my decayed tooth and replaced it with Dental implant without causing any Pain.
MI got Invisalign treatment done from here. Dr. Tanmay is extremely good. I am very happy with my treatment and recommend this clinic
